short_details: Learn the basics of web development, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, to kickstart your web development journey.
Take your JavaScript skills to the next level with advanced topics and hands-on projects.
Create beautiful, responsive websites that adapt to various screen sizes and devices.
Build powerful server-side applications using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.
Learn how to use Python to create web applications and automate tasks on the web.
Master popular frontend frameworks like React and Vue.js for building interactive web applications.
Protect web applications from security threats and learn ethical hacking techniques.
Design user-friendly and visually appealing web interfaces for exceptional user experiences.
Optimize websites for search engines and analyze user behavior to drive web traffic.
